name: Add a new row to a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet from a new project event in QuickCapture
description:
Every time a new event appears in your project in QuickCapture, a new row will be created in a Microsoft 365 Excel worksheet.

The template uses this [example worksheet](https://integromatservice-my.sharepoint.com/:x:/g/personal/integromat_integromatservice_onmicrosoft_com/EbV42Su75hxMvagW6RyJOhkBoUafp2D_1VBZIP49An3wFg?e=t9DRbf).
